content: strawberry fields pouch by @asawki_knits the strawberry fields pouch is a stranded colorwork pouch knit bottom-up with double folded edges that house the i-cord drawstrings finished measurements are 6in/15 25cm w x 8in/20 3cm l but you can modify the number of cast-on stitches and number of repeats of the chart to make any size pouch you d like techniques used turkish cast-on stranded colorwork magic loop double folded edges worked flat i-cord drawstrings yarn i used fingering weight scrap yarn from previous projects mc 25g friends cotton 8/4 in oatmilk #003 o approx 80m 87yds o yarn is 160m 174yds per 50g cc1 15g hikoo cobasi in vavavavoom red #054 o approx 60m 66yds o yarn is 201m 220yds per 50g cc2 12g friends cotton 8/4 in sage #114 o approx 39m 42yds o yarn is 160m 174yds per 50g suggested yarn any fingering weight yarn in the necessary colors should work great needles 3 25mm us size 3 100cm circular needles notions tapestry needle removable stitch marker scissors safety pin gauge 31 sts x 38 row = 10cm/4 in colorwork chart on 3 25mm us size 3 needles after blocking abbreviated terms k = knit p = purl mc = main color cc = contrast color co = cast on sts = stitches bor = beginning of round cast on 1 using mc co 90 sts using the turkish cast-on or your preferred cast-on method main body 2 k 4 rounds in mc place removable stitch marker in bottom corner rs to signify bor 3 begin colorwork chart holding cc in left hand and mc in right hand cc is always dominant repeat the entire colorwork chart 4 times a optional catch floats longer than 6 sts 4 k 2 rounds in mc 5 p 1 round in mc double folded edges worked flat 6 side a using mc work 10 rounds of stockinette while working flat fold the edge and k the double folded edge together cast om 7 repeat for side b using mc work 10 rounds of stockinette while working flat fold the edge and k the double folded edge together cast om 8 cut yarn and weave in all ends i-cord drawstrings 9 co 3 sts work i-cord drawstring for 13in and cast om cut yarn and weave in ends repeat once more to create second drawstring 10 feed drawstrings through each double folded edge using safety pin attached at one end tie overhand knot at either end of drawstrings colorwork chart designed by asawki_knits with stitch fiddle thank you so much for following along i d love to see what you make please tag me in your creations @asawki_knits and under hashtag #strawberryfieldspouch sincerely allyson
